text: Men who cook and clean should finish the look with a "Hello kitty" apron around their waist and find a good husband to take care of them

No one hates men and no one is saying being masculine is bad.  We only want men to allow other men be as emotional as they want to without it being considered gay. For example, a number of my friends (guys) cannot tell their fathers that they love them because it is ingrained in them that showing affection is feminine. Also alot of the times toxic masculinity has been cited by females is because it entails women being forced into stereotypes. For example, toxic masculinity is men not knowing how to cook or clean because it's a woman's job.
